all_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't choose this again. Some benefits but some very big drawbacks.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ConnectWise PSA?
We've been able to better control and assign work and keep track of open projects, both internal and for clients, and reduce manual work surrounding invoicing. Billable hours have increased as a result. With a distributed workforce, it's easier to get visibility into what's on each person's plate and where their time is spent.

What do you dislike about ConnectWise PSA?
Implementation was horrendous and took 10X the effort expected, which was really a burden for a smaller company that is light on administrative staff. As other reviewers have commented, Sales promised the moon but the actual system does not do what we were told, and the effort required from us has been substantial. For example, we were told that importing our extensive contact list would take minutes. It literally took three months of work, because our list had to be scrubbed and cleansed and revised to match their system's requirements, and each record had to be individually edited to enable assignment of basic market differentiators.

Also their support is slow and indifferent and tends to default to blaming either your workstation or user error before learning much about the actual issue. The chat function on the website is useless as the chat operators simply don't know enough about how the system works to answer questions or direct you to the correct documentation. As others mentioned, there are often five different ways to do the same thing and no way to evaluate if one way is better than another. Some of their logic is a bit crazy - for example, you can generate a report of "hours worked by work type" over time, but the report groups all hours into the first month the ticket was open! So if your ticket was open for several months, the time worked is all in the first month. The custom reporting function is arduous to learn to use.

They have a lot of training materials but they are difficult to navigate or search. I've spent an hour hunting down the answer to a simple question after the chat operator didn't know. The training itself does not weight the scoring of test questions according to the value of the information and is not geared towards real-world use of the system. It also contains many factual errors - after our purchase, I was told they knew these materials needed to be rewritten.

The biggest issue for us is that we're outside of their core client base of MSPs and were told repeatedly in the Sales process that this was not an issue and the system could be easily customized to our needs. After purchase, we found that that was not the case by a long shot. I suspect that ConnectWise may be an acceptable solution for MSPs. If you do exactly what the system is built for and don't need any custom functionality, your experience would probably be better than ours. I absolutely would NOT recommend them to anyone else. We've invested so much time now into making it work that we're not walking away, but they have some serious problems that I wish they'd take more seriously. In the meantime, they could work harder to keep their customers happy.

What problems is ConnectWise PSA solving and how is that benefiting you?
Some increased organization of projects and work assignments. It's better than using email for everything.

all_reviews.review_content:

ConnectWise allows our technicians to enter their time for service performed, resulting directly into a bill to our customers.  This is a tremendous improvement over the previous hand written, multi form, break away days!

What do you dislike about ConnectWise PSA?
There are a number of "feature requests" such as the ability to mass change time entries and a number of other efficiency improvements that we've identified, but not seen implemented.  Despite the occasional flaws, ConnectWise is an essential part of our business.

Recommendations to others considering ConnectWise PSA:
Absolutely consider ConnectWise as any costs are outweighed when you find the productivity of your company increases tremendously.

What problems is ConnectWise PSA solving and how is that benefiting you?
There is no conceivable way we'd be able to quality control the workload of our growing service department without a PSA tool like ConnectWise.  We're now more efficiently able to complete service, follow up on open issues, develop a sales pipeline, invoice our customers electronically, and a huge number of other benefits this software provides our company.

review_question_answers.answer: ConnectWise allowed us to manage our techs, our time, and our business objectives.  We used it for ticketing, reporting, SLAs, scheduling, dispatching, document storage, agreement monitoring, and the list goes on and on...

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ConnectWise PSA?
Before we started with Connectwise, we were using multiple programs to do the same thing.  This has streamlined things and eliminated the need to re-enter data.

What do you dislike about ConnectWise PSA?
I do wish the reporting worked better.  The report writer is still hard to use.  I also wish they didn't constantly change the user interface.  What we have had the most trouble with is getting the import to quickbooks to work how we need it to.   We had to work with the consultants a few times to get it right.

Recommendations to others considering ConnectWise PSA:
Be sure to take training modules in areas beyond your immediate job function.  it will help you understand how everything flows together.  Also, be sure to evaluate one of the quoting tools

What problems is ConnectWise PSA solving and how is that benefiting you?
We don't have to re-enter as much data, espically since it can import into QuickBooks.  I also like all the departments being able to see the same information on customers and opportunities.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ConnectWise PSA?
As a tool it is very robust and if set up correctly i can see how this would bring value to a company. The contract management piece alone has benefited our company.

What do you dislike about ConnectWise PSA?
CUSTOMER SERVICE AWFUL!! Never have i been faced with such poor service. We were sold the solution and promised to be up and live within a month by sales. Once on board our sales guys disappeared and our implementation tech confirmed this was impossible! Implementation was more along the lines of show and tell and was met with bad attitudes and scripts. When asked to implement the way we required we were told that it was not best practice. In then turned out that what we had been sold was no where near enough implementation to set up the system so are faced with more fees if we want more help. The support from the back of this is cumbersome at best and we have had no proactive account management,

We were advised by a competitor AutoTask of the issues with support from ConnectWise and they were very right.

What problems is ConnectWise PSA solving and how is that benefiting you?
WE have seen benefits in re-couping lost revenue from ad-hoc support work that would have normally not been recorded. However maintaining this system and setting it up has almost been a full time job and implementation is the worst experience ive had with a company.

all_reviews.review_title: Decent tool for a ticketing system, but not at all a sales system
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ConnectWise PSA?
The nice idea is that it is one system that the whole company can use it.

What do you dislike about ConnectWise PSA?
It lacks the ability to really be used for project management or sales.

What problems is ConnectWise PSA solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used this tool for our whole business, consulting, support, development, and sales. It has a great platform for solving our ticket/help desk business need.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ConnectWise PSA?
Connectwise is a full featured software for IT companies and internal IT departments.  Its main functions include service desk, service boards, company sections, billing and invoicing, project management, and sales.  The software continues to be improved, and new features are added regularly.  It covers so much ground that it is the clear market leader for PSA's to IT companies.

What do you dislike about ConnectWise PSA?
The sales and project areas both could use some additional functionality.  Visibility into sales functionality would be good.  Additionally project management functionality would be good.

Recommendations to others considering ConnectWise PSA:
Its the best tool for what it does in the market.

What problems is ConnectWise PSA solving and how is that benefiting you?
We can use it as one integrated tool for everything within our business.  Pair that with tightly integrated quoting and RMM tools and Connectwise gives us one pane of glass for our entire business.

all_reviews.review_title: Outdated design, glitchy UI, odd gaps in functionality, but might be the best of a terrible field
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ConnectWise PSA?
ConnectWise incorporates most of what a service provider needs to capture, from sales and purchasing through service delivery and invoicing.
Additionally, the ConnectWise community--regional user groups, annual conference, etc.--is a valuable resource for service providers.

What do you dislike about ConnectWise PSA?
Workflow is often confusing because there are too many ways to do the same thing, and no clear explanation of which is best, or what the implications are for choosing one method or another.

The application itself is at least a decade out of date.  Advances in design and UI that make the cheapest iPhone app work well are missing from this "professional" software.  A few examples:  no way to search the entire database (seriously), the documentation module is extremely limited, no way to setup a payment schedule for projects, and no way for end-users to schedule their own appointments.

Reporting is an absolute mess.

Recommendations to others considering ConnectWise PSA:
CW is probably the best of a bad field (including AutoTask, TigerPaw, etc.).  It's a very good value for the price, but I would happily pay twice as much for software that really worked better.

What problems is ConnectWise PSA solving and how is that benefiting you?
I use ConnectWise for sales tracking, service desk ticketing, and invoicing, managing a staff of about 20 engineers.

all_reviews.review_title: Good surface feature set, buggy and terrible customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ConnectWise PSA?
Array of functionality is powerful, some of the support documentation like the online university are useful in getting started

What do you dislike about ConnectWise PSA?
Customer service and product development is awful, support do their best to cover the gaps but can only do so much.  We have used the product for 4 years and have never seen a release on-time or one that did not cause more problems than it solved.  Customers service and account management do not seem able to cope with the fall out from the development problems as in our experience we are met with a wall of silence. Given the investment of money and time, and the critical nature of the platform in successful service delivery not having customer support .

Recommendations to others considering ConnectWise PSA:
Do not be seduced by the features until the customer service develop some rudimentary skills. You do not want to be in deep and find them come up short.

What problems is ConnectWise PSA solving and how is that benefiting you?
Integrated platform across the whole business, allows for better control and reporting.
